column4: i think i'll be going back to OS X soon, i can't deal very well without Photoshop and just having flash working in a web browser
can't get java to work either
my computer is not very functional with linux on it
i can't even run quake3 on ppc linux, i was dissapointed at that too
i think i'll be switching back very soon
its pretty sad that i can't even look at a flash based website
there's no flash support for ppc linux at all
as far as i can tell, java won't work in firefox on ppc linux either
but i'm stuck for now because i don't have my os x cd's with me
if you have a fast enough ppc, you can emulate an x86 with bochs
i play quake2 all the time on linux... have mod packs even... are you talking about ppc?
